Question & Options:
Which statements are true regarding the musical contributions to *X-Men: First Class*?
Options:
A. a) Henry Jackman was inspired by John Barry's musical themes.
B. b) Vaughn collaborated with Henry Jackman on *Kick-Ass (2010)*.
C. c) John Barry's themes influenced the musical style of *X-Men: First Class*.
D. d) Henry Jackman composed music that incorporated pop and rock elements.
Correct Answer: a) Henry Jackman was inspired by John Barry's musical themes. , b) Vaughn collaborated with Henry Jackman on *Kick-Ass (2010)*. , c) John Barry's themes influenced the musical style of *X-Men: First Class*. , d) Henry Jackman composed music that incorporated pop and rock elements.
